Package org.sosy_lab.java_smt.basicimpl

@CheckReturnValue @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault @FieldsAreNonnullByDefault @ReturnValuesAreNonnullByDefault package org.sosy_lab.java_smt.basicimpl
Abstract base classes for easier implementation of a solver backend.
